description: Try our easy to follow Mini Sausage Sizzle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mini Sausage Sizzle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbeque hotplate over low heat. When hot, cook beef chipolatas for 12 minutes or until golden on all sides and cooked through.

Meanwhile, put white dinner bread rolls in the oven. Cook as packet instructions, or on the barbeque covered by a roasting hood for 8 minutes or until heated through. Serve chipolatas with warm rolls and sides.
